entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023
